sentence.Network_en: He told wavering colleagues the country must back the Government's stance.

sentence.Network_en: I play normal bunker shots with an open stance.
sentence.Network_cn: 我打一般的沙坑球采取开立击球姿势。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a standing place): from French, from Italian stanza

entry.def: Your stance on a particular matter is your attitude to it.

example.ex: The Congress had agreed  to reconsider its stance on the armed struggle...
example.tran: 国会已同意重新考虑其对武装斗争的态度。

example.ex: They have maintained a consistently neutral stance...

entry.def: Your stance is the way that you are standing.

example.ex: Take a comfortably wide stance and flex your knees a little...
example.tran: 双腿适度分开站立，双膝稍稍弯曲。

example.ex: The woman detective shifted her stance from one foot to another.
example.tran: 女侦探改变了站姿，把重心从一只脚移到另一只脚。

auth_sentence.content: Sieda also called for Iran to reconsider its stance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sieda also called for Iran to reconsider its stance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sieda also called for Iran to reconsider its stance.

auth_sentence.content: Labour expressed its disappointment at the Government's stance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Labour expressed its disappointment at the Government's stance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Labour expressed its disappointment at the Government's stance.

auth_sentence.content: Obama has tried to walk back from his stance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Obama has tried to walk back from his stance.

means.word_mean: (运动员的)始发姿势；站姿；被放置的姿势

sentences.en: The boxer took up a fighting stance.
He lounged in an armchair in a stance of deliberate contempt.
sentences.cn: 他懒洋洋地躺在扶手椅里，故意摆出一种轻蔑的架势。

sentences.en: He has changed his stance on monetary union.
sentences.cn: 他已经改变了对货币联盟的态度。

sentences.en: Her public stance was much tougher than her private feelings on the subject.
sentences.cn: 在这一问题上，她公开的立场比她私下的态度要强硬得多。

sentences.en: The president has adopted a hardline stance against abortion.
sentences.cn: 总统在堕胎问题上持强硬的反对态度。

sentences.en: The wife of the accused has maintained an impartial stance throughout the trial.
sentences.cn: 在整个审判过程中，被告的妻子保持了不偏不倚的态度。
